#### Rationale
The Public Health Agency of Canada intends to acquire the services of two senior evaluation consultants to assist with evaluation and consultancy projects. The primary focus of these projects is on the appropriateness, effectiveness and efficiency of Health Canada’s and PHAC’s program activities. Interested parties must submit a proposal for consideration.
